```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)
require(cowplot)
require(igraph)
```


```{r load-data, echo = FALSE}
data <- read.csv('../speedrun_data_clean.csv', row.names = 1)
```

## World Record Trajectories

```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = normalised_run_date, y = normalised_run_time)) + geom_line(aes(group = id), size = 0.02)  + theme_minimal() + xlab('Normalised run date') + ylab('Normalised run time') + theme(aspect.ratio = 1)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = run_date_in_seconds, y = run_time_percentage)) + geom_line(aes(group = id), size = 0.02)  + theme_minimal() + xlab('Seconds since first record') + ylab('Percentage of time first record') + theme(aspect.ratio = 1)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = run_date_in_seconds, y = run_time_standard)) + geom_line(aes(group = id), size = 0.02)  + theme_minimal() + xlab('Seconds since first record') + ylab('Time reduced from first record') + theme(aspect.ratio = 1)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE,  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data, aes(x = run_date_in_seconds, y = run_time)) + geom_line(aes(group = id), size = 0.02)  + theme_minimal() + xlab('Seconds since first record') + ylab('Raw run time') + theme(aspect.ratio = 1)
```
